EmailTemplate.name: Product Effective to Expired
EmailTemplate.subject: Product Effective to – Expired
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Product Owner,
This is a final notice to let you know that the validity date for your product #{!Product2.SAP_Material_Number__c} has expired. This is your last chance to change or extend your product’s Effective To date. Please perform one of the following actions:
Extend the Effective To date to a future period if you still wish to sell the remaining inventory Should you not complete this action, the product will automatically be removed from the Online catalog tomorrow.
Best regards, eCommerce Support Team
